interactions.Alarm:

In the past, the user has requested the assistant to set recurring weekday alarms, often double-checking the details to ensure accuracy. They have also asked the assistant to modify existing alarms, either to adjust the time or change the alarm sound to a different nature-inspired option.

Over time, the user has developed a routine of asking the assistant to confirm their alarm settings the night before, seeking reassurance that they will wake up on time. They have also inquired about setting temporary alarms for occasional weekend activities or appointments.

The user appreciates the assistant's ability to provide clear and concise confirmations when setting or modifying alarms. They have expressed a preference for a friendly and supportive tone, valuing the assistant's understanding of their role as a stay-at-home parent and the importance of maintaining a consistent routine.

Additionally, the user has occasionally sought recommendations for alternative alarm sounds, particularly when they feel the need for a change or when transitioning to a new season. They have also inquired about the possibility of setting location-based alarms for future travel plans, demonstrating an interest in exploring the assistant's capabilities further.
